main event: A single silver, basketball-sized object was observed descending onto railroad tracks before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as 8-12 inches in diameter and silver with no markings.
12 other witnesses in the area at the time of the sighting did not observe the object.
The Intelligence Officer notes that the witness may have been experiencing a hallucination.
The sighting was reported to multiple military commands as part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
The object appeared to land on the railroad tracks before disappearing.
witnesses: a civilian member from Middletown, PA
